name: Welcome to the Void (Ethan Cossio)
description: This was a video game that a team of four (including myself) made in 48 hours during the Sixty Six Game Jam of January 2020. The theme was "Rules Mean Nothing" and the game was supposed to about breaking the rules inside a void owned by an omnipresent being in order to get out of the void with power ups each time a rule was broken. Needless to say, not everything came to be in 48 hours (including levels I've designed), but I hope you enjoy!
